name: mcp-voipnow-provisioning
description: Managing VoipNow entities, users, organizations, and service providers

tools.name: add
tools.description: Add entity (users, organizations, service providers). Hierarchy: Admin -> ServiceProvider (parent=Admin) -> Organization (parent=ServiceProvider) -> User (parent=Organization) -> Extension (parent=User).

tools.name: get
tools.description: Retrieve entities (users, organizations, service providers). Hierarchy: Admin -> ServiceProvider (parent=Admin) -> Organization (parent=ServiceProvider) -> User (parent=Organization) -> Extension (parent=User). Use parentID to filter.

tools.name: edit
tools.description: Edit entity (users, organizations, service providers). Hierarchy: Admin -> ServiceProvider (parent=Admin) -> Organization (parent=ServiceProvider) -> User (parent=Organization) -> Extension (parent=User). Specify entity with ID or identifier.

tools.name: delete
tools.description: Delete entity (users, organizations, service providers). Hierarchy: Admin -> ServiceProvider (parent=Admin) -> Organization (parent=ServiceProvider) -> User (parent=Organization) -> Extension (parent=User). WARNING: Deleting higher-level entities cascades to children.

tools.name: get-details
tools.description: Retrieve entity details by ID or identifier.

tools.name: get-user-groups
tools.description: Retrieve a list of group IDs for a user by ID or identifier.

tools.name: move-organization
tools.description: Move an organization to a specific service provider.

tools.name: set-control-panel-access
tools.description: Set control panel access for a user, organization, or service provider by ID or identifier.

tools.name: set-status
tools.description: Set the status for a user, organization, or service provider by ID or identifier.

tools.name: set-permissions-limits
tools.description: Set permissions and limits for an entity (users, organizations, service providers) by ID or identifier.

tools.name: get-permissions-limits
tools.description: Retrieve permissions and limits for an entity by ID or identifier.

tools.name: update-permissions-limits
tools.description: Update permissions and limits for an entity (users, organizations, service providers) by ID or identifier.

tools.name: add-extension
tools.description: Add extension to a User. Hierarchy: Admin -> ServiceProvider (parent=Admin) -> Organization (parent=ServiceProvider) -> User (parent=Organization) -> Extension (parent=User). Extensions belong to Users (parentID = User ID).

tools.name: get-extensions
tools.description: Retrieve extensions. Hierarchy: Admin -> ServiceProvider (parent=Admin) -> Organization (parent=ServiceProvider) -> User (parent=Organization) -> Extension (parent=User). Filter by User with parentID.
